item.title: More than 70,000 killed in Gaza since Israel offensive began, Hamas-run health ministry says
item.description: Two young brothers were among the latest killed - reportedly in an Israeli air strike as the Gaza ceasefire remains fragile.

item.title: Trump to pardon ex-Honduras president convicted of drug trafficking
item.description: Juan Orlando Hern√°ndez was sentenced in the US to 45 years behind bars for conspiring to smuggle cocaine.

item.title: Ukraine hits tankers in Black Sea in escalation against Russia
item.description: The two ships stuck by drones were thought to be used to bypass Western sanctions on Russia.

item.title: The Wiggles issue statement after appearing in Ecstasy music video
item.description: The popular Australian children's group says it "does not condone" drug use, after two of its members are shown dancing in a Keli Holiday video.

item.title: Venezuela calls Trump airspace closure warning 'colonialist threat'
item.description: US President Donald Trump said the airspace around Venezuela should be considered closed "in its entirety".
